summary: WHILE DRIVING, THE DRIVER'S SIDE DOOR PANEL BEGAN SMOKING AND THEN CAUGHT FIRE WITHOUT WARNING.  THE CONSUMER PUT OUT THE FLAMES, BUT THE PANEL KEPT SMOKING.  THE GROUND WIRE TO THE POWER WINDOWS HAD TO BE CUT TO STOP THE PANEL FROM SMOKING.  *JB  THE BURNED SWITCH ASSEMBLY WAS REPAIRED ON THE LEFT SIDE DOOR.  *SCC
